nd when I extract a URL from an
<img> HTML tag I want to remember the width=
/height parameters (if
their are any).

data to the instance. So that later my cus=
tom decide rules can check

g this with a UURI instance, but I was

rawlURI instance.

key, value )
methods with your own customer properties?

My problem, is at =
